author: cmpilato
msg: Teach libsvn_fs_base to deal with Berkeley 4.3 in a compatible way.
Based on a patch by Jani Averbach.
(bdb_error_gatherer): Signature changed, it now takes also
'DB_ENV *dbenv' as argument.  Deal with this compatibly.

author: julianfoad
msg: Avoid using a deprecated function.  Fix an encoding bug.
Fix encoding bug: was passing a native-encoded path to svn_path_is_url.

author: julianfoad
msg: Improve revision-parsing documentation, implementation, and testing.
(svn_opt_args_to_target_array2): Fix description: it does not convert
known_targets to UTF-8.  State that known_targets follow the other
targets, because we already relied on this ordering.
(svn_opt_parse_path): Ensure that only one revision number is present,
not a colon-separated pair.  Remove unnecessary use of a sub-pool.
Ensure that a canonical path is returned.
New file, with a test for svn_opt_parse_path.
(opt-test): New section for the new test file.

author: julianfoad
msg: APR can now make a dir recursively on most platforms, so we don't need our own
implementation.  It's not yet implemented for OS/2 in APR, but that's been the
case for two years now, and it's high time to force the issue.

author: striker
msg: Revert these changes.  Needs some rethinking.
Renamed from txn_body_xxx, and made semi-public (private to the FS).
Helper functions made semi-public (private to the FS), declaring them
here accompagnied by argument structures to pass to these functions.
